lead_paragraph: Think you've got the smarts to rein in climate change without crashing the global economy?
snippet: In the new strategy video game "Fate of the World," players singlehandedly confront that daunting challenge, while tackling peak oil, overpopulation and saving the rain forest to boot.
abstract: In the new strategy video game "Fate of the World," players singlehandedly confront that daunting challenge, while tackling peak oil, overpopulation and saving the rain forest to boot.
